TEXT.TITLE: BDM INTERNATIONAL <BDM> INCREASES QTRLY DIVS
TEXT.BODY: Annual div Class A 14 cts vs 12 cts prior Annual div Class B 12.1 cts vs 10.4 cts prior Payable April one Record March 20 NOTE: full name is BDM International Inc. Reuter
